author: Xbox
description:
Sunderfolk launches April 23, 2025 on Xbox Series X|S!

Rediscover Game Night with the magic of Sunderfolk, a new turn-based tactical RPG adventure where you use your mobile device as your controller*.  Built with the couch co-op experience in mind, up to four players can play together as you adventure through the magical and dangerous Sunderlands.

Learn more at https://www.xbox.com/games/store/sunderfolk/9NKT0W32RM3K

author: Xbox
description:
Maximum Football's Season Pass 2: Vice Blitz brings you to the sunny shores of the coastal Southeast where you can unlock the lime green turf of Seaside Park, a brand-new stadium surrounded by palm trees and coastal vibes. 

But Season 2 isn’t just about a fresh backdrop and new cosmetics—this update brings numerous meaningful changes based on the community's feedback. 

Play Maximum Football for free with Xbox Game Preview! 

Lead your team to victory in Maximum Football, the fully customizable, free-to-play football simulation game. Build and design your team your way, recruit your roster, and call the plays to dominate the gridiron with precise, realistic gameplay in the ultimate football universe. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/maximum-football-game-preview/9N5NG663BKSF/0010

author: Xbox
description:
A new era begins for Tour de France games. With the transition to a new graphics engine, Unreal Engine 5, you can enjoy enhanced visual quality and experience the roads of the Grande Boucle and other iconic races like never before.

With completely reworked landscapes and more realistic lighting effects, the Tour de France experience has never been closer to reality. Discover legendary locations of the sport, now depicted with even greater accuracy: Champs-Élysées, Trouée d’Arenberg, Mont Ventoux, Mur de Huy, and many more are waiting to be explored in Tour de France 2025.

In Tour de France 2025, you will now have the ability to create private games and challenge your friends on the road. A brand-new feeding system is also being introduced, revolutionizing race strategies.

Among other new features, the Criterium Mode now offers new rewards and five online leaderboards, along with the addition of new Courses and Descents of the Moment, plus more surprises to be revealed soon.

Tour
title: Tour de France 2025 | Announcement Trailer
